text: Proctor Silex Co. was created in 1960 with the merger of Proctor Electric and Silex Corporation. The company made household appliances such as toasters, irons, and coffee makers. In 1990 Proctor Silex merged with Hamilton Beach. == Other websites == * History of Proctor-Silex, 1788 to 1972 Category:Companies based in Virginia Category:1960 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Virginia
title: Proctor Silex
